title.bibl: Russkaya Pochta (Russian Post), July 14, 1917. List of the Russian Organizations Which Took Part in the Conference for the Reception of the Russian Mission

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

div.bibl: Russkaya Pochta (Russian Post), July 14, 1917. LIST OF THE RUSSIAN ORGANIZATIONS WHICH TOOK PART IN THE CONFERENCE FOR THE RECEPTION OF THE RUSSIAN MISSION

body.p: (Ed. Note: - This list has been corrected; some of the organizations were incorrectly named in the original article).
The Russian Parish (parish of the Holy Trinity)
The Parish of the Holy Archangel Mikhail
The Russian League of Physicians, Dentists and Pharmacists
The Russian Society of Mutual Aid
The Russian Society of Engineers of Chicago
The Chicago Group of the Russian Social-Democracy
